hero.Name: Green Lantern
hero.text: If you play three or more cards with different names and cost 1 more during your turn, +3 Power

hero.Name: Cyborg
hero.text: If you play one or more Super Powers during your turn, +1 power. If you play one or more Equipment during your turn, draw a card.

hero.Name: Superman
hero.text: +1 Power for each different Super Power you play during your turn

hero.Name: The Flash
hero.text: You go first. The first time a card tells you to draw one or more cards during each of your turns, draw an additional card.

hero.Name: Aquaman
hero.text: You may put any cards with cost 5 or less you buy or gain during your turn on top of your deck.

hero.Name: Wonderwoman
hero.text: For each Vilain you buy or gain during your turn, draw an extra card at the end of your turn.

hero.Name: Batman
hero.text: +1 Power for each quipment you play during your turn.
